Subject: Unable to print Outlook content, blocked by Browser Printing
Description:
Hi Support Team,

We have a user unable to print out Outlook contents to network printers or print to PDF file, but email attachment is ok. I checked the CAP logs and found the jobs have blocked by a policy "Browser Policy", but we don't have the policy and she is the only user got the issue. Please help to check.

Thanks

Tony Hsieh
Solution_Comment__c:
Closing as resolved after applying the following workaround.

Workaround:
- add to the exception the “Outlook” process (this means the Outlook will NOT be detoured, so the user will be able to print the files).
System Parameters -> Advanced Scanning Exceptions -> “Outlook” (add to content) -> check the process (generate)
